module.name: extended_measure_representation
module.keywords: module, value range, value list, qualified measure value

mapping.changes.description: Modifications made to the mapping specification of the following entity definitions (fixed syntax error): Measure_item_with_precision.

mapping.changes.mapping.change: Corrected syntax error in mapping of Measure_item.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of ranges and lists of property values, and of property values that are qualified.

inscope.li: range of measure values defined by a couple of values or by a value and a tolerance range;
items within the scope of application module Qualified measure, ISO/TS 10303-1782.

alt_map.description: value is a Value_limit or a Value_with_tolerances
alt_map.refpath: compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> compound_item_definition = list_representation_item list_representation_item[i] -> representation_item => [measure_representation_item] [qualified_representation_item]

alt_map.description: value is a Value_range or Value_range_with_global_unit
alt_map.refpath: compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> compound_item_definition = list_representation_item list_representation_item[i] -> representation_item => compound_representation_item => value_range

compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> compound_item_definition = list_representation_item list_representation_item[i] -> representation_item => measure_representation_item

compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> compound_item_definition = list_representation_item list_representation_item[i] -> representation_item => value_representation_item

alt_map.description: value is a Value_list or a Value_set
alt_map.refpath: compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> compound_item_definition = list_representation_item list_representation_item[i] -> representation_item => compound_representation_item

alt_map.description: value is a Value_limit or a Value_with_tolerances
alt_map.refpath: compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> compound_item_definition = set_representation_item set_representation_item[i] -> representation_item => [measure_representation_item] [qualified_representation_item]

alt_map.description: value is a Value_range or Value_range_with_global_unit
alt_map.refpath: compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> compound_item_definition = set_representation_item set_representation_item[i] -> representation_item => compound_representation_item => value_range

compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> compound_item_definition = set_representation_item set_representation_item[i] -> representation_item => measure_representation_item

compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> compound_item_definition = set_representation_item set_representation_item[i] -> representation_item => value_representation_item

alt_map.description: value is a Value_list or a Value_set
alt_map.refpath: compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> compound_item_definition = set_representation_item set_representation_item[i] -> representation_item => compound_representation_item

aa.refpath: value_range <= compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> set_representation_item set_representation_item[i] -> representation_item {representation_item.name = 'lower limit'} representation_item => measure_representation_item

value_range <= compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> set_representation_item set_representation_item[i] -> representation_item {representation_item.name = 'upper limit'} representation_item => measure_representation_item

value_range <= compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> set_representation_item set_representation_item[i] -> representation_item {representation_item.name = 'lower limit'} representation_item => value_representation_item

value_range <= compound_representation_item compound_representation_item.item_element -> set_representation_item set_representation_item[i] -> representation_item {representation_item.name = 'upper limit'} representation_item => value_representation_item

qualified_representation_item qualified_representation_item.qualifiers[i] -> value_qualifier = uncertainty_qualifier {uncertainty_qualifier.measure_name='lower limit'} uncertainty_qualifier => standard_uncertainty standard_uncertainty.uncertainty_value

qualified_representation_item qualified_representation_item.qualifiers[i] -> value_qualifier = uncertainty_qualifier {uncertainty_qualifier.measure_name='upper limit'} uncertainty_qualifier => standard_uncertainty standard_uncertainty.uncertainty_value
